info.name: Qooxdoo API Viewer
info.summary: A viewer application to browse generated API documentation of qooxdoo classes
info.description: The Api Viewer lets you browse API documentation generated from Javascript source comments. It supports many specifics of qooxdoo classes like inheritance, properties and private members.
